newsentry.title: MyCoRe User Workshop
newsentry.message: Announcement: From 13 to 15 November the annual MyCoRe User Workshop will take place in Leipzig.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: MyCoRe at the DBT 2018
newsentry.message: MyCoRe user and developer presented lectures at the 107th Librarian Day in Berlin.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Update
newsentry.message: MIR and Skeleton are using the current LongTermSupport release version 2017.06.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The digital library „Institutional Repository of TU Braunschweig“ has received the DINI certificate.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
